sentence.Network_en: A timely billet - doux can patch up a lovers'quarrel.
sentence.Network_cn: 一封适时的情书可以停止情侣间的争吵.

sentence.Network_en: The handsome man who wooed the fair lady wrote a romantic billet - doux, but a blank.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个英俊的男士给他所追求的漂亮姑娘写了一封浪漫的情书, 但是结果却是竹篮子打水 —— 一场空啊.
